Uses of Package
com.jcoinche.rules

  • Packages that use com.jcoinche.rules 
    Package Description
    com.jcoinche.rules  
    com.jcoinche.server  
  • Classes in com.jcoinche.rules used by com.jcoinche.rules 
    Class Description
    Card
    This class represents a card by defining all of its characteristics.
    Card.CardName  
    Card.CardType  
    Deck
    This class represents the deck we use for the coinche A deck is composed of 32 cards (8 per color from the Seven to the Ace)
    Player
    This class represents a player A player has an id a hand (list of cards) and it stocks its points for the current round.
  • Classes in com.jcoinche.rules used by com.jcoinche.server 
    Class Description
    GameRules
    This class represents all of the game rules of the coinche game This class contains the deck, the list of the players, the game board and so on It also manage the execution of a game by starting the rounds and counting the points of each team
